name: Shipwrecked - Hack Club
subtitle: A source for apps created through Hack Club's Shipwrecked program.
description: This is a source for apps created through Hack Club's Shipwrecked program (https://shipwrecked.hackclub.com/)

apps.name: MusicMap
apps.subtitle: Log the mood, Share the music.
apps.localizedDescription:
MusicMap is a purpose built platform that connects your emotions to the music that you love, and lets you share that experience socially. Whether you're crafting mood-based playlists, blending music with friends, or sharing how a track makes you feel, MusicMap turns your listening habits into something more meaningful.

What Currently Works:
Search and Home functions are fully functional
Emotions tab works
The app connects with Last.fm to pull live listening data
Settings menu is active, with working buttons for deleting emotions, logging out, and deleting your account

Coming Soon:
Real-time emotion tagging display for the search function
Social and Playlist tabs with full functionality
Add in optional personal descriptions
Share emotions and descriptions in your story, add friends via codes, and view their activity
Add music-related Notes, like Instagram Notes, for quick emotional insights
Create emotion-based playlists or blends, mixing one or more emotions or two users' tastes to generate shared playlists

apps.name: Pachyderm
apps.subtitle: A beautiful Mastodon client for iOS.
apps.localizedDescription: A beautiful Mastodon client for iOS, written in SwiftUI.
